About.title: Overview
About.des: Situated in a Croatian suburb, this Tuscany-inspired villa exudes elegance. Its terracotta roof and lush garden reflect Italian charm. Divided into two apartments, each creates a warm and inviting atmosphere.
About.des2: Outside, there is a pristine pool surrounded by a Mediterranean landscape. This villa seamlessly combines timeless aesthetics with modern comfort, offering a peaceful oasis in the Croatian suburbs.

the_space.title: The space
the_space.des: On the first floor of this Croatian villa, the first apartment exudes comfort and style. It features four spacious bedrooms, each offering a cozy retreat. Two well-equipped bathrooms ensure convenience and privacy. The heart of the home is a large kitchen, designed for culinary delights and gatherings. A beautiful terrace overlooks the enchanting Brijuni Islands, providing a stunning backdrop for outdoor dining and relaxation.
the_space.des2: In contrast, the second apartment boasts a modern design on the lower level. With two elegant bedrooms, it offers a contemporary living experience. A generously sized bathroom and an additional WC meet practical needs. The expansive living room is the focal point, providing a spacious and open area for entertaining and modern living. This apartment radiates a contemporary and minimalist aesthetic, creating a stylish and inviting atmosphere for its residents.

guest_access.title: Guest Access
guest_access.des: Jacuzzi, sauna, bikes, ps4, trampoline, barbecue.

locations.title: What to see and visit:
des: - Explore the beautiful islands of Brijuni National Park, rich in natural beauty and cultural heritage.
- Discover the ancient Roman amphitheater in Pula, one of the best-preserved Roman amphitheaters in the world.

- Dive into the underwater world at Pula Aquarium, located near the city center. Explore various marine habitats, observe diverse aquatic species, and learn about the importance of marine conservation.

- Experience thrilling water slides, lazy rivers, and relaxing pools at Istralandia Aquapark, located near Novigrad. Perfect for families and water enthusiasts, this aquapark offers a fun-filled day for all ages.

Payment_conditions.subtitle: TERMS & CONDITIONS
Payment_conditions.title: Payment and booking conditions
Payment_conditions.des: Tourist tax is not included in the price!
Payment_conditions.des2: For your reservation to be secured it is obligation to pay 30% of full price in advance directly to owner of accommodation and 70% when you come to accommodation unit.
Payment_conditions.des3: Deposit refundable if all is well: 500 euros.
Payment_conditions.des4: Possibility of free cancellation one week after booking (EXCEPT IN LAST MINUTE RESERVATIONS, THEN THE DEADLINE IS 48 HOURS). Last minute - Reservation two weeks before.
Payment_conditions.des5: On the last day of the stay, the guest is obliged to leave the accommodation until 10 am, so the other guests can check in from 4 pm.
Payment_conditions.des6: Kindly note that pets are not permitted on the premises.

Environs.title: Vodnjan & Istria
Environs.des: Vodnjan is a charming town located in the heart of Istria, Croatia. Known for its rich history, medieval architecture, and picturesque streets, it offers a glimpse into traditional Istrian life. Surrounded by olive groves, vineyards, and the beautiful Adriatic coast, Vodnjan is also famous for its high-quality olive oil production. Nearby attractions include the ancient Roman town of Pula, the Brijuni Islands National Park, and stunning beaches, making it a perfect destination for nature lovers and history enthusiasts alike.
Environs.des2: You can reach the house by car or taxi. Parking is free and available on site.
